author: Lyly L
title: it was every penny worth it!
text: It was well furnished and the receptionists were so helpful! Three times a week, they had a shadow art performance. You might also participate a course to learn it or to paint the shadow art figures. It was conveniently situated(10minutes to the tube station Beihai North). It's perfect for you, if you like to see how the habitants live, because the hotel is surrounded by houses of habitants. The breakfast buffet was average. Sometimes the "hot food" wasn't hot.
